richtext.contents:
About this Demo

This Skuid demo showcases yet another layout for Help Desk/ Case Management workflow that puts the case rep first. 

Recognizing the Case Rep's needs to multi-task and get to the right info quickly, we design this demo with the ability to keep a list of "Open cases", or cases you're currently working on, so you can go back and forth between cases without losing productivity. 

We also allow for a better customer service experience, where we use Skuid's powerful search component to start a customer interaction by asking for customer's name, phone number, or email, find the existing contact and account, then create a case accordingly.

Example searches:  Contact names: "Edna", "Joel", "Paul", "John", Email: "gmail", Phone numbers:  "555-", "123"
